# Workflow Automation System

## Project Overview
A complete web-based workflow automation system replacing Google Sheets with drag-and-drop interface.

## Tech Stack
- Next.js (React + Node.js)
- TypeScript
- Firebase (Firestore + Auth)
- Tailwind CSS
- Zapier API
- Google Sheets API
